func.title: DoBreath

param.name: change
param.desc: Change of the breath value (positive or negative) in percent of the maximum value. 100% correspond to the maximum physical value 100,000.

param.name: obj
param.desc: Object of which you want to change breath. Can be 0 in local calls.

func.desc: Changes the breath value of an object.

example.text: Gives 50% more breath to the selected clonk of the first player.
